item.description:
The Great American Tavern
303 Main St
No. Reading MA

April 28, 2012  5:00 pm

Our 1st event was a huge success. Come see us again on 4/28 at The Great American Tavern with DJ JODI. A place where us ladies can all meet, have a few drinks and a great meal to be followed with dancing.

Come celebrate our 2nd event "Strictly GIRLLLLS" at this location on April 28, 2011.

** RESERVATIONS for DINNER ((Make sure you mention BLUSH EVENT)) are being taking by calling 978 207 1240 **

A great place to meet some fabulous women.

We have an all female sexy staff that will cater to us.

• FREE Parking
• DJ JODI
• Top Shelf Alcohol
• Sexy Female Staff
• Fine Dining
• PIANO Bar
• and more to come……………..
item.name: Just Like Laurel's But Better
